title: Account Stuck Mid-Transfer EUW to RUS pls help

embed.title: Kiyoshisama - Summoner search results - League of Legends
embed.description: Kiyoshisama / Diamond 4 80LP / 357W 338L Win Ratio 51% / Taliyah - 39W 21L Win Ratio 65%, LeBlanc - 30W 29L Win Ratio 51%, Syndra - 29W 27L Win Ratio 52%, Ahri - 32W 23L Win Ratio 58%, Orianna - 25W 19L Win Ratio 57%

body:
I changed my region from EUW to RU on my Smurf account about 2 weeks ago and when i tried to log in on RUS it says 
"Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes". 
When i tried to log in on EUW it says "Your account has been transfered to a different region". 

I have been checking regularly for the past days but nothing has changed and I can't log in on this website with my smurf either.

The name of the account is: Kiyoshisama

replies.body: Please contact the official [Riot Games Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can't help you with your problem.

why could the NA Support help him then?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bQI6slME-account-still-transferring-after-24-hours

Because HE is a rioter, and I am just a [wrenchmen](http://en.volu-eu.org/about_us.php) and NOT part of Riot Games.

Wrenchmen like me, can help you with technical difficulties, but not with account problems.

(Rioters have a red name and the riot games fist next to them.)

I am helping players voluntary, and don't get payed for it.

And you have to be lucky that a rioter sees your post. You can't rely on it.

That's why you should contact the offical support over the link in my last post.
